revised_title: A Yearly Register of Weather Patterns and Phenomena in Lyndon, Rutland
tldr: This article presents a detailed record of weather patterns, including barometer and thermometer readings, in Lyndon, Rutland, from January to December 1783. The author also discusses the impact of these weather conditions on crops, vegetation, and overall climate. Notable events include a severe frost, a dry season, and a continuous three-day rain in May.
